00059          /**
00060           * connect to the database
00061           */
00062          function connect() {
00063                   $this->link= simpledb_connect($this->dbconfig['host'], $this->dbconfig['login'], $this->dbconfig['password']);
00064                   if (!$this->link) {
00065                            throw new DatabaseConnectException("Could not connect to Database ".$this->dbconfig['host']);
00066                   }
00067                   if (!empty ($this->dbconfig['database'])) {
00068                            if (!simpledb_select_db($this->dbconfig['database'], $this->link)) {
00069                                     throw new DatabaseConnectException("Could not select Database ".$this->dbconfig['database']);
00070                            }
00071                   }
00072 
00073                   if (!empty($this->dbconfig['encoding'])) {
00074                            //TODO well... do semething $this->query("FOO '".$this->dbconfig['encoding']."'");
00075                   }
00076 
00077                   $this->connected= true;
00078          }
00079 
00080          function isConnected() {
00081                   return $this->connected;
00082          }
00083 
00084          /**
00085           * return the current link to the database, connect first if needed
00086           */
00087          public function getLink() {
00088                   if (!$this->connected) {
00089                            $this->connect();
00090                   }
00091                   return $this->link;
00092          }
00093 
00094          public function setLink($l) {
00095                   $this->link= $l;

00099          /**
00100           * execute this query
00101           * @return mixed
00102           */
00103          private function execute($sql) {
00104                   if (!$this->connected) {
00105                            $this->connect();
00106                   }
00107 
00108                   $start= microtime(true);
00109                   $this->result= simpledb_query($sql, $this->link);
00110 
00111                   if (false === $this->result) {
00112                            writeLog(simpledb_get_last_message().': '.$sql, KATA_ERROR);
00113                            throw new DatabaseErrorException(simpledb_get_last_message());
00114                   }
00115                   if (DEBUG > 0) {
00116                            $this->queries[]= array (
00117                                     kataGetLineInfo(),
00118                                     $sql,
00119                                     '',
00120                                     simpledb_get_last_message(),
00121                                      (microtime(true) - $start).'sec'
00122                            );
00123                   }
00124          }

00140          /**
00141           * return the result of the last query.
00142           * @param mixed $idname if $idname is false keys are simply incrementing from 0, if $idname is string the key is the value of the column specified in the string
00143           */
00144          private function & lastResult() {
00145          }
00146 
00147          /**
00148           * execute query and return useful data depending on query-type
00149           *
00150           * @param string $s sql-statement
00151           * @param string $idname which field-value to use as the key of the returned array (false=dont care)
00152           * @return array
00153           */
00154          function & query($s, $idnames= false) {
00155                   $s= trim($s);
00156 
00157                   $this->execute($s);
00158 
00159                   $what= strtolower(substr($s, 0, 5));
00160                   $result= null;
00161                   switch ($what) {
00162                            case 'delet' :
00163                                     break;
00164 
00165                            case 'repla' :
00166                            case 'updat' :
00167                                     break;
00168 
00169                            case 'inser' :
00170                                     break;
00171 
00172                            case 'selec' :
00173                                     $result= $this->lastResult();
00174                                     return $result;
00175                                     break;
00176 
00177                            case 'set n' :
00178                                     $result= null;
00179                                     return $result;
00180                                     break;
00181                   }
00182 
00183                   throw new Exception('Dont know what to do with your query');
00184          }

00186          /**
00187           * escape the given string so it can be safely appended to any sql
00188           * @param string $sql string to escape
00189           * @return string
00190           */
00191          function escape($sql) {
00192                   return str_replace("'", "''", $sql);
00193          }

00195          /**
00196           * output any queries made, how long it took, the result and any errors if DEBUG
00197           */
00198          function __destruct() {
00199                   if (DEBUG > 0) {
00200                            array_unshift($this->queries, array (
00201                                     'line',
00202                                     '',
00203                                     'affected',
00204                                     'error',
00205                                     'time'
00206                            ));
00207                            kataDebugOutput($this->queries, true);
00208                   }
00209                   if ($this->connected) {
00210                            simpledb_close($this->link);
00211                   }
00212          }

00233           *

00235           *
00236           * Array

00238           *     [table] => test
00239           *     [primary] => a

00243           *                 (
00244           *                     [default] => CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
00245           *                     [null] =>
00246           *                     [unique] =>
00247           *                     [length] => 0
00248           *                     [type] => date
00249           *                 )
00250           *
00251           *             [g] => Array
00252           *                 (
00253           *                     [default] =>
00254           *                     [null] =>
00255           *                     [unique] =>
00256           *                     [length] => 0
00257           *                     [type] => unsupported:time
00258           *                 )
00259           *
00260           *             [j] => Array
00261           *                 (
00262           *                     [default] =>
00263           *                     [null] =>
00264           *                     [unique] =>
00265           *                     [length] => 0
00266           *                     [type] => enum
00267           *                     [values] => Array
00268           *                         (
00269           *                             [0] => a
00270           *                             [1] => B
00271           *                             [2] => c
00272           *                         )
00273           *
00274           *                 )
00275           *
00276           *         )
00277           *
00278           * )
00279           * </code>
00280           *
